name: Hunt: Showdown - Law of Salvage
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary Tool: Captain Laffite (Legendary Hunter), Scuttled Glory (Legendary Winfield 1887 Terminus), Knuckle Shunt (Legendary Scottfield Model 3 Brawler), Hagfish Bronze (Legendary Choke Bomb)
